transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan boliye.
Customer: Good afternoon sir, Vineet baat kar raha hu Ahmedabad se.
Executive: Haan boliye na sir.
Customer: Sir actually aapka koi concern tha to aapne customer ke number pe call kiya tha, Shruti se bhi baat hui hai aapki, aap mujhe batayenge sir kya problem hai, Shruti bata rahi thi kuch issue hai.
Customer: Shruti ne nahi bataya kyunki mera to matlab manager hai na to unko problem pura pata rahega na, barabar na.
Executive: Shruti ne to bataya rahega na.
Customer: Shruti se sir meri detail hai, unhone bas ye bataya ki aapko relevant lead nahi aa rahi, kis category mein aap kaam karte hain.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Ji, aap kaunsi category keh rahe hain sir aap mujhe ek baar ye batayenge?
Customer: Ye roller cleaner hai.
Executive: Okay. Roller cleaner. Pharma packaging mein.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To itne dino se to ye chal raha tha, to aaj bol rahe hain ki aap matlab ye category mein ye nahi ye karke, to main surprise hu.
Customer: Sir agar main Itna dino se to nahi chalta hoga na, agar aisa ye nahi hai to itne dino se IndiaMART pe chalna hi nahi chahiye tha.
Executive: Kya nahi hai?
Customer: Ek to aap kam pad rahi, haan, nahi matlab main matlab rakhna hi nahi chahiye tha business matlab aapke saath.
Executive: Nahi aap keh rahe hain roller cleaner hamare paas, hamare paas roller cleaner as a category to available hai.
Customer: Haan haan, right.
Executive: Aur uski aapne lead bhi consume ki hai, matlab hamare paas agar specifically roller cleaner ki baat karu, pichle 12 mahine mein sir lead hi kam aayi hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hamare paas total, hamare paas last 12 months ki jo lead aayi hai IndiaMART pe wo 51 aayi hai and out of, out of 51 last 12 months mein aapne jo consume ki hai, 15 consume ki hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ab kyunki iski hamare paas buylead hi kam generate hoti hai to sir aap dekho 12 mahine yaani 12 months mein aap 51 generate hui hai is category ki.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Kuch aur jaise aapke paas na multiple categories available hain yahan pe, aapne total 11 categories dali hai, brass wire brushes, splicing tapes, roller cleaners, hai na, blister machine change parts, to hum to aapko sare categories ki hi lead dete hain, lekin aap specifically roller cleaners ki lead chahte hain to us category ki lead hamare paas bhi sir abhi kam hi generate hoti hai, 51 leads aayi hai in last 12 months, usme se aapka consumption bhi 15 hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aur itni agar itni competitive line hai, itna competitive product hai ki itni kam aa rahi hai aur aap itni consume kar pa rahe hain to obviously wo lead jaldi sold out ho rahi hogi.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To aap thoda sa iska, thoda sa aisa apna jo screen time hai wo badhaiye, kyunki dekha gaya hai last 90 days mein aapne IndiaMART pe sirf 13 days buylead consume ki hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Kya rehta hai na aap zyada buylead consume karoge ya zyada active rahoge to chances of getting the relevant lead jo aap chahte hain wo badh jayega, ab 51 leads aa rahi hai ek saal ke andar aapne consume nahi ki, maan lijiye abhi lead aayi 3, 5 baje, aapne consume nahi ki aap se pehle paanch logon ne wo consume kar li, to jo first five sellers hain na wohi lead usko, wohi lead ki details dekh sakte hain aur usse baat kar sakte hain, rest of the sellers ke liye wo wahan se sold out ho jati hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Aapko wo sold out leads mein dikhegi ya nahi dikhegi.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Theek hai to iska sir ekmatra agar ispe specifically is category ki baat kar rahe ho to thoda sa apna screen time aapko increase karna padega.
Customer: Theek hai chalega, theek hai main karwa deta hu.
Executive: Ji wo bhi main aapko aisa commitment nahi de raha ki aap out of 51, 51 ki 51 consume kar sakte hain, lekin ye hai ki 15 ko hum log 25, 30 kar sakte hain, badha sakte hain.
Customer: Right right right, I agree I agree, aap jo bol rahe hain baat sahi hai, theek hai wo matlab, lekin kya hai wo relevant nahi hai to main nahi purchase karta, simply baat, simple baat hai.
Executive: Koi baat nahi sir, aap ek, aap, aap ek, aap khud hi use karte hain ki staff use karta hai aapka IndiaMART?
Customer: Mera staff bhi rehta hai, main bhi rehta hu, lekin thoda bahut ye rehta hai to definitely main hi karta hu, thoda bahut bhi relate karta hai.
Executive: Aaj, aaj 3 tareekh hai sir, aaj Monday hai, jo coming Monday hai na, isko hum ek baar aur connect karenge coming Monday ko, main yahan pe apna reminder set karta hu, Shruti ne jo aapko aap iska feedback dena, aap is 7 din ke andar na thodi si apni activity IndiaMART ke upar jitna aap use karte hain usse badha dijiyega.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai, chalega.
Executive: To hume pata lag jayega highlight ho jayega ki bhai aapko leads mil rahi hain ya aa rahi hai ya nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Okay okay, chalega, mera staff hai already uske liye rakha hai to usko bolta hu main continuously matlab uske upar.
Executive: Yaani jitni zyada consume karoge na aap active zyada rahoge to aapko inquiries bhi zyada aayengi IndiaMART ke upar jo direct inquiries mails aate hain.
Customer: To ek product ya har ek product pe ke upar ye karu bol rahe hain.
Executive: Sir wo har ek product ki baat kar raha hu, specifically agar aapko chahiye roller cleaner to aap sabki lead consume kar lo aapko sabki inquiry badh jayegi, hum log bhi unhi buyer ko seller ko lead dena chahte hain inquiry dena chahte hain jo zyada active ho jo entertain kare hamari requirement ko, aisa na ho usko requirement aayi aur wo usse baat hi na kare, hai na, wo fir buyer ka track kharab hota hai.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Theek hai na, to aaj reminder we will connect on Monday for this jo aap bata rahe hain ki ye wala issue hai tab tak main aapka ticket aaya tha wo close kar raha hu, aapko next feedback aayega mail pe sir usko satisfied mark kar dijiyega, in case aapko koi problem aata hai main apne number se hi WhatsApp kar raha hu, Shruti ka number aapke paas hai hi, aap unko directly connect kar lijiyega, theek hai.
Customer: Okay, ya.
Executive: To thank you.
Customer: Yeah yeah.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting relevant leads.

Resolution:

- Executive explained about lead generation process.

- Executive suggested increasing screen time on IndiaMART.

- Executive explained about lead consumption.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect on coming Monday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, category, roller cleaner
